name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Albert H. BEAVER, Jr., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Beaver
docket_number: No. 83, Disciplinary Docket No. 3; No. 11 DB 95—Disciplinary Board

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Albert H. BEAVER, Jr., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 22nd day of June, 1995, on certification by the Disciplinary Board that the respondent, ALBERT H. BEAVER, JR., who was suspended by Order of this Court dated February 7,1995, for a period of ninety days, has filed a verified statement showing compliance with all the terms and conditions of the Order of suspension and Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E., and there being no other outstanding order of suspension or disbarment, ALBERT H. BEAVER, JR. is hereby reinstated to active status, effective immediately.
MONTEMURO, J., sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
660 A.2d 50
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Albert H. BEAVER, Jr., Respondent.
No. 83, Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
No. 11 DB 95—Disciplinary Board.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 22, 1995.
